title: Hotel Horizon
description: Collaborative project streamlining hotel booking for business travelers. Search, explore, and bookmark favorites with Google Places and Booking.com APIs. Developed with HTML, JavaScript, and CSS for a simplified hotel planning experience.

title: City Weather Hub
description: Simple and user-friendly weather forecast application that allows users to check the current weather and a 5-day forecast for a specific city.

title: Build a README
description: Simplify the process of creating basic README files for your projects. This command-line application uses the Inquirer package to dynamically generate a professional README.md file based on your input.

title: Code Quiz
description: A beginner-friendly JavaScript-based quiz introducing web development fundamentals. Explore coding concepts, get instant feedback, and view your score.

title: Easy Plan Tracker
description: A very basic, simple and straightforward work/business calendar app designed to help users manage their daily schedules and events. (In progress)

title: Bootstrap Portfolio
description: A personal portfolio using Bootstrap CSS Framework to gain hands-on experience in HTML, CSS, GitHub, and GitHub Pages.
